name: Shooting Star (itch) (prestoncam)
description:
Dash at the stars to stop them from getting to the ground!
The game gets progressively harder as time goes on.
Try to maximize your high score!

Controls:
Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
Dash: X or LMB
Jump: C, RMB, or Spacebar

Pause: Esc

Post your high score in the comments!
